reviews.text: Food is pretty good. Drinks are at US prices. Serious language barriers with wait staff. While dancing was not bad, music was awful. Experience could also have been better if it weren't for rude patrons talking loudly through the show!
reviews.title: Just OK
Worth seeing. Probably 3 1/2 stars
reviews.text: It,s a dinner theatre, with the $25us charge covering meal and performance.
